Change Log
==========

-----------------
- Change plotting method to subplots, Return figure

-----------------
- Update optional parameters

-----------------
- Update optional parameters

0.1.2 (3/08/2023)
-----------------
- Add six optional parameters for the HRDiagram function

0.1.1 (2/08/2023)
-----------------
- Fix the out-of-bound RGB value error

0.1.0 (2/08/2023)
-----------------
- Initial Release
